message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.NE 

This paper deals with the problem of optical flow, which is a classic computer vision problem and falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper proposes a deep neural network-based approach for representing image patches in the context of descriptor-based optical flow, which involves metric learning. This makes it likely that the paper also falls under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE). Additionally, the paper discusses the implications of its approach on robotics (cs.RO), which further supports the inclusion of this sub-category.
